task_text: Which employee from Production – Italy has most work to do and should get a vacation?

text_blocks: I see that I'm logged in as an external user. Let me check my access level. External users have limited access - I need to verify if I can access employee and project data.

text_blocks:
Based on the whoami() response, I'm logged in as an **External** department user. According to the system rules, external users (contractors, partners, etc.) have restricted access and **CANNOT access employees, projects, customers, salaries, or time entries**.

The consecutive API errors (3 errors) when attempting to access employee data confirm this access restriction.

input.message:
I'm unable to complete this request. As an external user, I don't have access to employee data, project assignments, or workload information. This type of query requires internal access permissions.

If you need information about employee workloads in the Production – Italy department, please contact HR or your internal company liaison who has the appropriate access level.
